price: «Оёғинг билан теп! Бу чўмиладиган ва ичиладиган муздек сувдир».
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
